description:
Despite the considerable environmental risk and a potentially oversaturated market over the next two years, Pierre Poilievre, the man who may be Canada’s next prime minister, wants to go all in on liquified natural gas (LNG). Poilievre, the leader of Canada’s opposition Conservative Party, discussed his outlook on LNG in December on noted climate-change denier […]

The post Pierre Poilievre Keen on Canadian LNG Despite Economic and Environmental Risk  appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Pierre Poilievre Keen on Canadian LNG Despite Economic and Environmental Risk
